CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: " Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...7. James Savory, Eastern representative for Krey Packing Company, introduced Krey's unusual wares to all visitors...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: James Savory standing in Krey Food booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
